column5: This year is a leap year so we get an extra day in February.  One question...... WHO WAS THE TOOL THAT PICKED FEBRUARY!!!!!! Couldnt have stuck it on July or Septmeber but the worst month of the year. I am sick of Febrauary already! MY rant is over now back to the hockey game.
This adds an extra day to the icefishing season on Scugog and Quinte.......I'm not complaining!  Get out there and fish!!  Sinker
i'm with bucktail on this one....lets drag him out and give him a nice polar bear dip in the west arm of nippissing!
so you want Feb. to have 30 days for now on and July have 28 days every year but on the 4th year we have 29 days in July
